response.original_title: Confío, un viaje a la esperanza
response.overview: From Maracaibo, five Venezuelans decide to follow in the footsteps of Faustina Kowalska, a young Polish woman to whom the image of Merciful Jesus was revealed, along with a message of hope for all humanity. They toured more than ten cities between Poland, Lithuania and Italy, discovering a powerful connection between the message of Mercy, John Paul II and the repercussions of World War II.
response.title: Confío, un viaje a la esperanza
